abstract: The government wants to raise money by selling stakes in three utilities, the Greek railway, the racetrack, the national lottery and unused facilities.
snippet: The government wants to raise money by selling stakes in three utilities, the Greek railway, the racetrack, the national lottery and unused facilities.
lead_paragraph: ATHENS — Worries about Greece’s intractable debt problem deepened on Monday, stoking fears that the country remains on a path to fiscal disaster and that European leaders do not have a convincing plan to prevent a default.

headline.main: Unease About Greece Grows as S.&P. Downgrades Its Debt Again
headline.print_headline: Unease About Greece Grows as S.&P. Downgrades Its Debt Again

byline.original: By Niki Kitsantonis and Jack Ewing
